title: Upside Down Pumpkin Cake
ingredients: 1 (18.25oz) pkg yellow cake mix with pudding
instructions: Preheat oven 350°. In mixing bowl blend pumpkin, spices, sugar, eggs, milk. Pour into 9x13" baking dish. Sprinkle dry cake mix & nuts over batter. Pour melted butter over cake. Bake for 60 mins & let cool. Cake will be "liquidy" at first but will solidify as it cools.
